fullText: Tom Stoppard's brilliant 1993 play about the nature of knowledge gets a handsome Broadway revival that honors both the wit and the complexity of this demanding work.
dtliExcerpt: Tom Stoppard's brilliant 1993 play about the nature of knowledge gets a handsome Broadway revival that honors both the wit and the complexity of this demanding work.
